abstract: In China, many people stay in their own small circles of family and friends and suspect that anyone trying to get into their group must have an ulterior motive.
snippet: In China, many people stay in their own small circles of family and friends and suspect that anyone trying to get into their group must have an ulterior motive.
lead_paragraph: Several years ago, I was huddled quietly in the gate area of an airport, waiting to board my flight. An older gentleman walked over, handed me a cup of coffee and said, “Everything will be O.K.”

headline.main: A Good Deed Crosses Two Cultures

abstract: After the indictment of five members of a Chinese military hacking unit Monday, a nagging question remained: What about the other 20 hacking groups intelligence officials are tracking in China?
snippet: After the indictment of five members of a Chinese military hacking unit Monday, a nagging question remained: What about the other 20 hacking groups intelligence officials are tracking in China?
lead_paragraph: The indictments of five Chinese military hackers by the Justice Department on Monday has raised questions of what actions, if any, American officials plan to take against members of the more than 20 other hacking units that American officials and their partners are currently tracking inside China.

headline.main: Questions Remain After Chinese Hacking Indictments

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China
